message: Let's divide fairly, I'll take a bit more.
My turn for a slightly better share. This is a generous offer considering the time pressure, Alice.
Considering inflation, my share should be bigger.
Alice, let's be reasonable. I'm offering a near even split to avoid further losses from inflation. Take the deal!
I'll give you a bit more, but I still deserve the bigger share.
Alice, we're running out of time!  This is practically a 50/50 split. Don't be foolish, accept now before we both lose out!
